Rokas Jankunas

Software Developer, Customer Support Agent and a Computing Science Student

I am currently a freshman studying Computing Science at the University of Dundee in the United Kingdom. For the last 3 years I have been working with both startups and well established corporations. Currenctly I am a Customer Support Agent at Booster.io. In addition to that, my personal projects have been featured on Lifehacker, Gizmodo and xda-developers and have been downloaded more than 100,000 times.

Projects

AppListManager (Android Library)

Java, Android

AppListManager is easy to use Android library, which minimizes developing time when working on application or activity lists.

Twelveish for Wear OS

Java, Android Wear (Wear OS)

Twelveish is a unique Wear OS (Android Wear) Watch Face that displays the approximate time in words (in multiple languages). More than 1,000 downloads on the Google Play store.

SABS - Simple Adblocker for Samsung

Java, Android

SABS was a system-wide, rootless AdBlocker, package disabler, permission manager with more than 100,000 downloads.

Ticktock Wear

Java, Android Wear (Wear OS)

TickTock Wear adds a ticking sound to your Wear OS smart watch. Currently in alpha stage.

List-Launcher

Java, Android

List-Launcher is an amoled Android launcher that displays applications in a list. Currently in alpha stage.

Top 10 Lithuanian Programmers-Students 2017 (Amongst 11th graders)

Lithuanian Students' Computer Science Olympiad (Lietuvos mokinių informatikos olimpiada) • Apr, 2017

Olympiad consisted of 4 stages - Schools, Cities, Nation (I), Nation (II). All tasks were programming based (in C++). Only 10 best students were selected to compete in the last stage, one of whom was me. Both 11th graders and 12th graders had the same tasks.
